text: Yeh ehle kitab agar aaj tumse mutalaba kar rahey hain ke tum aasman se koi tehrir (written) unpar nazil karao to issey badh chadh kar mujreemana mutalibe ye pehle Moosa se kar chuke hain. Ussey to inhon ne kaha tha ke humein khuda ko alaniya (with our own eyes) dikha do aur isi sarkashi ki wajah se yakayak inpar bijli toot padi thi. Phir inhon ne bachde(calf) ko apna mabood bana liya, halaanke yeh khuli khuli nishaniyan dekh chuke thay is par bhi humne inse darguzar kiya. Humne Moosa ko sareeh farmaan ata kiya
